properties.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Western Roosevelt
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 12 at 3:17AM MST until February 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as
35 below zero.

* WHERE...Central and Southern Valley and Western Roosevelt
Counties.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads will remain icy today from snow that
fell Tuesday Night.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
